avatarConfig.subtitle: Avatar configuration
avatarConfig.uploadLimit: File is too large. Please choose an image that is smaller than 5 MB.
avatarConfig.uploadInfo: Max. 5 MB. Your uploaded avatar will be scaled to 64x64 pixels.
avatarConfig.invalidImageFormat: Selected filetype is not supported. Please choose an image of the following formats: jpg, jpeg, gif, png, svg, tiff

predefined.label: Predefined avatar
predefined.helpText: An avatar can be selected from a pre-selection of icons and colors.

uploaded.label: Uploaded avatar
uploaded.helpText: The avatar will be created from an uploaded image in 64x64 pixel format.
